definition[0]: the size of a ship or the amount of goods it can carry, shown in tonnes
definition[1]: the total number of tonnes that something weighs
example[0]: A huge tonnage of bombs has already been dropped on the area.
definition[2]: the total number of tons that something weighs
example[1]: The aim is to obtain the maximum saleable tonnage at reasonable cost.
definition[3]: the size of a ship or the amount of goods it can carry, measured in tons
